songs.title: Can You Feel My Heart
lyrics: Can you hear the silence?
Can you see the dark?
Can you fix the broken?
Can you feel, can you feel my heart?
I'm scared to get close and I hate being alone
I long for that feeling to not feel at all
The higher I get, the lower I'll sink
I can't drown my demons, they know how to swim

songs.title: Shadow Moses
lyrics: This is sempiternal
This is the start of the end
This is where the fallen rise
This is where the fallen fall
So you can drag me through hell
If it meant I could hold your hand
I would walk through fire
Just to be with you

songs.title: Throne
lyrics: So you can throw me to the wolves
Tomorrow I will come back
Leader of the whole pack
Beat me black and blue
Every wound will shape me
Every scar will build my throne
You can tell me I'm wrong
But I know that you're not listening

songs.title: Drown
lyrics: What doesn't kill you makes you wish you were dead
Got a hole in my soul growing deeper and deeper
And I can't take one more moment of this silence
The loneliness is haunting me
And the weight of the world's getting harder to hold up
It comes in waves, I close my eyes
Hold my breath and let it bury me

songs.title: Happy Song
lyrics: S-P-I-R-I-T, spirit, let's hear it!
I'm gonna sing until my lungs give out
I'm gonna sing until my lungs give out
So what if I can't forget you?
I'll burn your name into my throat
I'll be everything you're not
This is a happy song

songs.title: True Friends
lyrics: True friends stab you in the front
So you can drag me through hell
If it meant I could hold your hand
I would walk through fire
Just to be with you
So you can throw me to the wolves
Tomorrow I will come back
Leader of the whole pack

songs.title: Avalanche
lyrics: I'm an avalanche
One word away from killing us both
I'm a hand grenade
Pin already pulled so don't let go
I'm a nuclear bomb
If you move, I'm going to blow
I'm a ticking time bomb
And I'm about to explode

songs.title: Follow You
lyrics: So you can drag me through hell
If it meant I could hold your hand
I would walk through fire
Just to be with you
And I don't think you even realize
The effect you have on me
Under your spell again
I can't say no to you

songs.title: Mantra
lyrics: Before the truth will set you free
It'll piss you off
Before you find a place to be
You're gonna lose the plot
Before you find a way to go
You're gonna lose your mind
Before the truth will set you free
It'll piss you off

songs.title: Wonderful Life
lyrics: What a wonderful life
What a wonderful time to be alive
What a wonderful life
What a wonderful time to be alive
I'm so happy I could die
I'm so happy I could die
I'm so happy I could die
I'm so happy I could die

songs.title: Medicine
lyrics: Some people are a lot like clouds, you know
'Cause life's so much brighter when they go
You're a pill, harder to swallow
Than I thought you'd be
I'm so sorry, but I'm not sorry
I'm so sorry, but I'm not sorry
Some people are a lot like clouds, you know
'Cause life's so much brighter when they go

songs.title: Mother Tongue
lyrics: I don't know what to say
But I'm gonna want you till the stars fade
And there's no words I could put on a page
But I'll try to tell you anyway
I don't know what to say
But I'm gonna want you till the stars fade
And there's no words I could put on a page
But I'll try to tell you anyway

songs.title: Parasite Eve
lyrics: When we forget the infection
Will we remember the lesson?
If the suspense doesn't kill you
Something else will
Move, move, move, move
When we forget the infection
Will we remember the lesson?
If the suspense doesn't kill you
Something else will

songs.title: Teardrops
lyrics: I'm scared to get close and I hate being alone
I long for that feeling to not feel at all
The higher I get, the lower I'll sink
I can't drown my demons, they know how to swim
So you can drag me through hell
If it meant I could hold your hand
I would walk through fire
Just to be with you

songs.title: Obey
lyrics: We're slaves to the algorithm
We're slaves to the algorithm
We're slaves to the algorithm
We're slaves to the algorithm
We're slaves to the algorithm
We're slaves to the algorithm
We're slaves to the algorithm
We're slaves to the algorithm

songs.title: Kingslayer
lyrics: Bow down to the kingslayer
Bow down to the kingslayer
Bow down to the kingslayer
Bow down to the kingslayer
Bow down to the kingslayer
Bow down to the kingslayer
Bow down to the kingslayer
Bow down to the kingslayer
